channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Moon GPS Is Coming
item.description: Nations and companies are ramping up their efforts to deploy the first satnav on the moon to support a flurry of planned missions there.

item.title: Spotify launches its evolving playlist, daylist, globally
item.description: Spotify is launching daylist globally. It’s a personalized playlist that evolves throughout the day depending on your listening habits. This rollout c...

item.title: Antony Blinken Dragged US Diplomacy Into the 21st Century. Even He’s Surprised by the Results
item.description: Two major wars. A rising China. Hackers everywhere. He’s the US secretary of state, and he says he’s here to help.

item.title: Impact investors FMO and BlueOrchard back Ghana’s digital lender Fido in $30M Series B round
item.description: Digital lending platforms have become an easy and swift alternative source of credit for microenterprises and individuals overlooked by traditional ba...

item.title: The Japanese Robot Controversy Lurking in Israel’s Military Supply Chain
item.description: Activists claim Japanese industrial robots are being used to build military equipment for Israel. The robot maker denies the claims, but the episode r...

item.title: PharmEasy still 92% below its peak $5.6 billion valuation, investor estimates
item.description: Indian online pharmacy startup PharmEasy, once valued at $5.6 billion, is still about 92% below its peak valuation, according to new estimates by its ...

item.title: The Search for the Face Behind Mavis Beacon Teaches Typing

item.title: From their experiences at Uber and PayPal, Palm founders want to make moving cash easier for big companies
item.description: Palm launched in 2023 with the goal of making cash management for enterprise treasury teams easier. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For person...

item.title: 21 Top New Android 15 Features (2024): How to Install, Features, Release Date
item.description: Android 15 has finally arrived. Here are the notable features and upgrades Google is rolling out.

item.title: Canva has increased prices for its Teams product
item.description: Canva, the design platform, is increasing prices steeply for some customers. And it’s blaming the move in part on generative AI. In the U.S., some Can...
